data.comment: The match has started.
David Coote signals a free kick to West Ham.
In the minute 2, West Ham have been awarded a corner by David Coote.
Crystal Palace push forward at London Stadium and Wilfried Zaha gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined West Ham defence.
Throw-in for Crystal Palace in the half of West Ham.
In the minute 7, David Coote awards West Ham a goal kick.
David Coote signals a throw-in for West Ham, close to Crystal Palace's area.
West Ham's Declan Rice gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 8, Ball goes out of play for a Crystal Palace goal kick.
David Coote awards the home team a throw-in.
Can Crystal Palace get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in West Ham's half?
In the minute 13, Ball safe as West Ham is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Christian Benteke's header is off-target for Crystal Palace.
West Ham have a goal kick.
In the minute 16, West Ham attack but Pablo Fornals's header doesn't find the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in London.
Crystal Palace to take a throw-in in West Ham territory.
In the minute 18, Corner awarded to West Ham.
Tomas Soucek (West Ham) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Crystal Palace defenders.
Throw-in for West Ham at London Stadium.
In the minute 20, Throw-in for West Ham in their own half.
Crystal Palace awarded a throw-in in their own half.
David Coote waits before resuming play because Aaron Cresswell for West Ham is still down.
In the minute 23, David Coote signals a West Ham throw-in in Crystal Palace's half.
Crystal Palace have been awarded a corner by David Coote.
Crystal Palace to take a throw-in in West Ham territory.
In the minute 25, Aaron Cresswell has recovered and rejoins the match in London.
Free kick for West Ham in the half of Crystal Palace.
Throw-in Crystal Palace.
In the minute 28, West Ham awarded a free kick in their own half.
In London a free kick has been awarded the home team.
David Coote signals a free kick to West Ham in their own half.
In the minute 31, Crystal Palace's Christian Benteke has been booked in London.
Crystal Palace have a dangerous throw-in.
Ball safe as West Ham is awarded a throw-in in their half.
David Coote signals a Crystal Palace throw-in in West Ham's half.
In the minute 34, Crystal Palace's Christian Benteke scores with his head to give his side a 0-1 lead.
Joel Ward with an assist there.
In the minute 36, Can Crystal Palace get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in West Ham's half?
Free kick for West Ham in their own half.
Crystal Palace's Christian Benteke attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
In the minute 38, Goal kick for West Ham at London Stadium.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Crystal Palace in their own half.
In the minute 40, Free kick Crystal Palace.
Throw-in West Ham.
Luka Milivojevic (Crystal Palace) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 41, Throw-in high up the field for West Ham in London.
West Ham's Jarrod Bowen is on target but unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to West Ham.
In the minute 42, David Coote awards Crystal Palace a goal kick.
Christian Benteke gets his shot on target but fails to score for Crystal Palace.
David Coote awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 44, West Ham awarded a free kick in their own half.
2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
West Ham needs to be cautious. Crystal Palace have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 45, Christian Benteke of Crystal Palace gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a West Ham goal kick.
David Coote blows to end the first-half.
In the minute 46, David Coote has blown to start the second-half.
Throw-in for Crystal Palace close to the penalty box.
The home team replace Pablo Fornals with Manuel Lanzini.
In the minute 48, David Coote signals a free kick to West Ham.
West Ham's Aaron Cresswell breaks free at London Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Crystal Palace have a goal kick.
In the minute 49, Free kick for Crystal Palace in the half of West Ham.
Free kick Crystal Palace.
West Ham awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 52, Can West Ham capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Crystal Palace's half?
In London a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Throw-in for West Ham at London Stadium.
Sebastian Haller grabs a goal to bring things level at 1-1 at London Stadium.
In the minute 55, Great play from Vladimir Coufal to set up the goal.
David Coote signals a free kick to Crystal Palace.
In the minute 58, Throw-in for Crystal Palace in the half of West Ham.
Throw-in for West Ham in their own half.
David Coote signals a free kick to West Ham in their own half.
In the minute 59, Can West Ham get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Crystal Palace's half?
Can West Ham capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Crystal Palace's half?
Free kick for Crystal Palace in their own half.
In the minute 61, Crystal Palace to take a throw-in in West Ham territory.
Patrick Van Aanholt of Crystal Palace smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Crystal Palace have been awarded a corner by David Coote.
In the minute 65, Goal kick for Crystal Palace at London Stadium.
It's a goal kick for the away team in London.
It's a goal kick for the home team in London.
In London West Ham attack through Jarrod Bowen. The finish is off target, however.
Crystal Palace have a goal kick.
In the minute 70, David Coote signals a free kick to West Ham in their own half.
In the minute 70, Christian Benteke in Crystal Palace has been yellow-carded a second time by David Coote and is being sent off.
Tomas Soucek is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Goal kick for Crystal Palace at London Stadium.
In the minute 74, West Ham's Tomas Soucek looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Free kick for West Ham in their own half.
Luka Milivojevic is booked for the away team.
Corner awarded to West Ham.
In the minute 76, Jordan Ayew is replacing Eberechi Eze for Crystal Palace at London Stadium.
Throw-in for Crystal Palace at London Stadium.
In the minute 77, Sebastian Haller (West Ham) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
David Coote awards Crystal Palace a goal kick.
Throw-in for West Ham in the half of Crystal Palace.
In the minute 79, West Ham have a dangerous throw-in.
Ball safe as Crystal Palace is awarded a throw-in in their half.
West Ham make their second substitution with Andriy Yarmolenko replacing Jarrod Bowen.
In the minute 81, West Ham have been awarded a corner by David Coote.
Crystal Palace awarded a free kick in their own half.
David Coote signals a Crystal Palace throw-in in West Ham's half.
In the minute 84, Throw-in West Ham.
Crystal Palace needs to be cautious. West Ham have an attacking throw-in.
Ball goes out of play for a Crystal Palace goal kick.
In the minute 85, Roy Hodgson (Crystal Palace) is making a second substitution, with Jeffrey Schlupp replacing Andros Townsend.
David Coote awards the home team a throw-in.
Crystal Palace awarded a free kick in their own half.
Crystal Palace awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 88, David Moyes is making the team's third substitution at London Stadium with Robert Snodgrass replacing Said Benrahma.
In London a free kick has been awarded the away team.
David Coote signals a throw-in for Crystal Palace, close to West Ham's area.
Throw-in for West Ham in their own half.
The fourth official's board shows 4 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Declan Rice for West Ham gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
David Coote awards Crystal Palace a goal kick.
Sebastian Haller (West Ham) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Ball goes out of play for a Crystal Palace goal kick.
Corner awarded to Crystal Palace.
The match is over. Final score 1-1.
